author: skitching
msg: Allow external code to query whether a conversation context already exists or not, without creating one as a side-effect.

Clean up some confusing APIs. Previously, some of the getXXX methods would create things as a side-effect, and others would not. And some took a boolean create-or-not parameter. Now, all get methods are side-effect-free except for getInstance(), and a getOrCreate version exists to force creation of objects.

author: bommel
msg: (TOBAGO-653) Create a own JsonResponseWriter for dojo ajax requests

author: etnu
msg: Improved guice integration for BasicGadgetSpecFactory -- uses a real boolean and won't create unnecessary instances.
